blogs.title: Dinno and Aliens
blogs.author: aishwary
blogs.body:
Dino is a miniature form of a herbivores dinosaur. They are quite hardworking.
and aliens are some celestial beings who regularly attack earth.
Dinos help keep the earth safe by shooing aliens away

blogs.title: raja aur rani
blogs.author: aishwary
blogs.body:
Ek raja tha,
Ek Rani thi 
Dono mar gaye, Khatam kahani thi

blogs.title: Cheetah hi kehde
blogs.author: ayushi
blogs.body:
Meghalaya ke jungalo mein ek aadamkhor baagh ka aatank macha hua tha. Desh bhar se kayi shikari bukaye gaye par koi na maar paya.
Ramu naam ke ek kisan ne baagh pakadne ki zimmedari li.
Usne apni bakri ko rassi se baandh diya .
